root: ^Hey, I'm Elian, and was looking to find somebody to help me report a big story
^That sounds great! What type of big story are you talking about?
^I want to expose Eclipse for some shady activities that they've been doing.
^I already have some basic evidence, but nothing directly from them
^Wow, really? I would have never expected them.
^I can help you out with that, but we need some hard evidence
^Eclipse is holding a mixer next week so make sure you have at least $10,000,000 and no debt so they invite you.
^Thanks so much! I'll be sure to head over to the South East of town to meet with you guys at the mixer.
